work.name: Ozette
highlights: Formalized infrastructure as code patterns and laid foundation for improved velocity and code quality in the form of code quality checks in continuous integration.
Migrated original infrastructure off Kubernetes to AWS native components.
Worked with Computational Biologists to scale and productionize data pipelines using Nextflow and AWS Batch.
Designed and implemented a serverless, scalable ingestion pipeline for FCS files.
Designed and implemented a recursive query builder feature that let users make arbitrary selections over uploaded files.
Worked across the stack, and across the organization, implementing and designing features with React, Flask, Postgres, and Infrastructure elements.

work.name: Allen Institute for Artificial Intelligence
highlights: Designed and implemented an eventually consistent search experience on Semantic Scholar backed by a reranking ML model. This increased search latency by 50% in p95 and improved search quality by 30%.
Designed and lead a migration from a batch-based PDF extraction pipeline to scalable, event-driven pipeline, which enabled extracted metadata to be visible to users in hours instead of days.
Decreased processing time for pipeline input containing 200m documents from 1 month to 1 week. This also increased the number of paper abstracts available to users from 40m to 80m.
Upgraded, maintained, analyzed, and utilized multiple AWS RDS instances to support event-driven ETL pipeline.
Integrated several heterogenous, 3rd party data sources into incremental data pipeline.
Processed and performed ad-hoc analyses on terabytes of data in Spark.
Lead data team on code quality efforts and started a repository for cross-team libraries.
Designed and lead implementation of Semantic Scholar 'Library' feature while mentoring two interns.
Created, tested, and experimented data in a multi-terabyte Elasticsearch cluster.
Built an interactive parse tree visualization application to aid in AI research.
Refactored frontend bundling logic that decreased desktop JS bundle size by 5% and mobile bundle by 15%.
Designed and implemented a custom client-side analytics solution that allowed developers to quickly and declaratively add analytics to components.

work.name: Sublime Media
highlights: Development lead for two major projects built in React.
Converted wireframes and design comps into complete applications.
